freesmartphone.org Framework DBus Interface Specification

org.freesmartphone.Notification

Description

The Notification interface is used to signalize important information about certain FSO services. It also is used to deliver the Alarm notification.

Namespace

org.freesmartphone.Notification

Methods

  • Alarm

Signals

None

Errors

None

Methods

Alarm ( )

Description: Sent, when an alarm that has been scheduled with AddAlarm has been triggered.
